title: SAP Demo Data Personalization Add-On Enhances Customer-Focused Demonstrations
summary: SAP has introduced a new add-on for personalizing demo data, promising real-time, customer-focused demonstrations. This could enhance relevance for sales teams and customers, potentially improving the employee service experience.
hook: SAP's new add-on personalizes demo data for improved ES.

title: MuleSoft gains Agent Scanners to rein in enterprise AI chaos
summary: Salesforce has introduced Agent Scanners to its MuleSoft platform, aiming to manage agent sprawl and improve operational efficiency. This feature could significantly impact enterprises looking to scale AI safely and responsibly, by reducing fragmentation and redundancy in workflows across teams and platforms.
hook: MuleSoft introduces Agent Scanners to manage enterprise AI chaos

title: ServiceNow will embed OpenAI models into its AI Platform
summary: ServiceNow plans to integrate OpenAI models into its AI platform to enhance enterprise AI outcomes and develop direct speech-to-speech technology. This move, driven by customer demand and advancements in AI, will enable more natural interactions and break language barriers, potentially transforming the employee service experience.
hook: ServiceNow to revolutionize ES with OpenAI integration!

title: GoodData launches MCP server to fuel AI-powered analysis
summary: GoodData has launched a Model Context Protocol server, enabling AI tools to access proprietary data for continuous analysis and development of analytics tools. This standardizes the connection between AI applications and data sources, simplifying the development process and potentially enhancing ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX operations.
hook: GoodData's new server simplifies AI data access for continuous analysis.

title: Latest News
summary: Enghouse Interactive, a global provider of customer contact software, offers a comprehensive portfolio of modular solutions that cover the full range of contact centre capabilities, including AI-enabled agent evaluation. The solutions are platform agnostic and integrate with various UC vendors, offering flexibility for different deployment options.
hook: Enghouse Interactive offers AI-enabled contact centre solutions.

title: News
summary: A new tool is introducing real-time budget awareness into agent reasoning loops, aiming to control escalating costs in enterprise technology. This development is significant for ITSM/ITOM/HRSM/ESM/EX buyers as it could help manage costs in mission-critical apps like ERP, CRM, and data platforms, which have seen the largest cost increases due to vendor consolidation, consumption-based pricing, and market leverage.
hook: New tool tackles rising costs in enterprise tech!

title: News
summary: Salesforce is enhancing its AI capabilities through acquisitions and has introduced pay-as-you-go and pre-commit payment options for its Agentforce suite. This could lower the entry barrier for companies seeking AI solutions for their ES needs.
hook: Salesforce boosts AI capabilities, introduces flexible payment options
